page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: {LAND USE Our area consists of some of the most beautiful countryside found between the River Severn and the Forest of Dean.The rolling wooded hills rise sharply from the Severn valley.They are famous for sheep and for fruit growing.The area includes several small hamlets like{Little London}and {Flaxley}and two contrasting villages {Blaisdon and Longhope}which are the focal points of our survey.The villages are about 10 miles south west of the city of{Gloucester}and there is some commuting but there is also local employment.We have had a great deal of help in compiling this survey from{Mrs {Pickering}of the Blaisdon Women's Institute,from{Ian Cameron}Chairman of Longhope Parish Council and{Mrs {Harvey,Head Teacher}of Longhope Church of England primary school.
